title: 2022 FIFA World Cup
description: From a dataset of all matches' statistics, there is a complete exploratory analysis using Python that leads to an outstanding understanding of what was this last World Cup.

title: 2022 SISU registrations analysis
description: This Jupyter Notebook refers to a general overview regarding how the 2022 SISU successful candidates, as well as their grades by area of ​​knowledge, are distributed throughout Brazil. It is possible to take a look at all that using the most popular Python libraries for data visualisation.

title: A data visualiser
description: A web application for graphical visualization of the formatted input data. It is a simple but complete client server application to consolidate the knowledges surrounding web development.

title: A password manager
description: An application that allows managing various login and password data and registering them RSA-encrypted into an SQL database, using the python sqlite3 module, through an interactive python tkinter GUI.
